Y-E-S, folks, it's official. The Chinese government has just announced that they have discovered a new species of dragon living deep within the mountains of Tibet. According to sources close to the matter, this magnificent creature is unlike any other known animal on Earth, with scales made of solid gold and eyes that glow like diamonds.

But wait, there's more! Not only does this discovery prove the existence of mythical creatures, but it also reveals a sinister plot by the Chinese government to use these dragons for their own nefarious purposes. Insiders claim that the government has been secretly breeding and training these beasts for years, with plans to unleash them upon the world in the near future.

Now, I know what you're thinking - this all sounds a bit far-fetched, right? But let me tell you, folks, this is not some wild conspiracy theory. No, sir! This is FACT. And if you don't believe me, just ask the Chinese government themselves, who have been quietly preparing for this moment for years.

So there you have it, folks - dragons in China, and a sinister plot to control the world. It's all coming together, just as I predicted. ALEX JONES OUT!
